attributes.description: The Jaguar 2012 XKR-S was the most powerful and quickest series production sports car that Jaguar ever built. The companies most responsive, powerful, agile and driver focused production car. The XKR-S is a limit production (200 units total). 50 units were built RHD for the UK of which approximately 20 cars sold in South Africa. The standard XKR 5 litre gives 503hp but the XKR-S delivers 542hp, enough to out accelerate the Maserati Grand Tourismo, Bentley Continental GT and Aston Martin DBS and has completed the Nurburgring in sub eight minute laps, states chief engineer Mike Cross of Jaguar. Originally priced at around R1.8 million when introduced to South Africa this vehicle is a gift not to be missed. WITH ONLY 200 PRODUCED WORLD WIDE THIS PRISTINE SUPER COUPE BOASTS A FULL SERVICE HISTORY AND PRESENTS BEAUTIFULLY IN WHITE OVER A BLACK LEATHER INTERIOR AND CARBON EXTERIOR ACCENTS. ITS LOADED WITH ALL THE CREATURE COMFORTS YOU COULD WANT INCLUDING - BOWER AND WILKINS SURROUND SOUND SYSTEM - TOUCH SCREEN INFOTAINMENT SYSTEM - NAVIGATION - REVERSE CAMERA WITH PARKING GUIDANCE - FRONT AND REAR PARK DISTANCE CONTROL - XENON HEADLIGHTS - 20 "OEM LIGHT ALLOY WHEELS - KEYLESS ENTRY AND START - BLUETOOTH - DUAL CLIMATE CONTROL - ELECTRIC SEATS WITH MEMORY FUNCTION - MULTI FUNCTIONAL STEERING WHEEL AND MUCH MUCH MORE. CALL US NOW TO MAKE THIS VERY DESIRABLE COLLECTORS SPORTS CAR YOURS. FINANCE AVAILABLE. TRADE INS WELCOME
